title: Cardano and Christianity for Africa
description: Further economic identity and empowerment, for financial inclusion across the African continent in harmony with Christianity.
solution: We envision accelerating Cardano in Africa by making each Christian Parish, a Cardano Stake Pool with an Atala PRISM dApp.
experience: We are the FAITH Stake Pool Startup. We come from Big-Tech and are passionate about Cardano and how it will change our world.
